name: The Myth of Zayla [NES ROM]
description:
The Myth of Zayla is my entry for the annual ByteOff competition. It is made by one person in one month with a software called NES Maker. Please note you will need an emulator to play this game! Suggested emulators: Mesen / FCEUX.

There is also manual & full soundtrack as separate files. Music was composed by me and made with Famitracker. Most of the GFX has been ispired by Midjourneybot and Dall-E 2. 

"Princess captured by frankenstein, 8 bit pixelart" (Midjourneybot)

Princess Zayla

"Angel pixelart" (Dall-E 2)

Mafaldrian, Guardian of Zerno

Note: Last submission for competition is September 16th. So there might be a slight chance that I will update the game if someone reports there is a bug. In other aspects the game is "ready". I hope you'll like it as much as I liked making it. 

BEWARE! There will be some twisted humor that might not be suitable for the strict minded. xD
